[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

 

Spend Valentine’s Day with your loved one in the fairy tale ambience of the Esplanade Hotel and let divine delicacies and a touch of glamour ignite the sparks of love.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Surprise your loved one with a magical dinner in the elegant setting of Zinfandel’s Restaurant, raise a toast to eternal love with our  Love Poison signature cocktail as selected by Vjenceslav Madić Master Kishoni and indulge in enticingly flavoured dishes as selected by Executive Chef Ana Grgić Tomić, such as scallop tartar with yuzu gel, gnudi with roasted carrot cream, poached sole fillet, guinea fowl with parsnip cream, and seductive frozen desserts with raspberries, white chocolate, and pitaya. The romantic atmosphere will be further spiced up with romantic classics played by pianist Marina Matolić, and the ladies will receive a red rose and a small token of appreciation from a well-known Croatian cosmetics company Nikel.

The gala Valentine’s dinner at Zinfandel’s Restaurant will be served on Wednesday, 14 February 2024 from 7 pm and the price is 125 € per person. The menu includes a welcome cocktail and five courses of carefully selected delicacies. The number of tables is limited. Prior table reservation is mandatory at 01 45 666 44.

Continue the celebration with Valentine’s Day cocktails in the romantic atmosphere of the Esplanade 1925 Lounge & Cocktail Bar, which will celebrate Valentine’s Day with a special offer of enticing cocktails during February. Cupid’s Arrow, Power of Love, Sweetheart – let the Esplanade’s mixologists prepare you some  fantastic cocktails. To book your table at the Esplanade 1925 Lounge & Cocktail Bar, please call 01 45 666 33.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space]

[vc_column_text]

Continue the celebration with Valentine’s Day cocktails in the romantic atmosphere of the Esplanade 1925 Lounge & Cocktail Bar, which will celebrate Valentine’s Day with a special offer of enticing cocktails during February. Cupid’s Arrow, Power of Love, Sweetheart – let the Esplanade’s mixologists prepare you some  fantastic cocktails. To book your table at the Esplanade 1925 Lounge & Cocktail Bar, please call 01 45 666 33.

If you want to spend the night with your loved one, ignite your  passion and spend some wonderful moments in one of the Esplanade’s luxurious rooms or suites, where you can arrange to be greeted with chilled sparkling wine, the finest chocolate pralines, red roses, or balloons, while waking up to an à la carte selection of delicious breakfast options in your room or at Zinfandel’s Restaurant. Pamper your loved one with a perfect gift they will remember for years to come. Book accommodation online or by email at reservations@esplanade.hr.

Surprise your loved one with the most romantic gesture on Valentine’s Day. Our excellent pastry chefs have prepared the sweetest gift – a special heart-shaped dessert with raspberries and velvety ruby chocolate packaged in a carefully designed pink box with a bow.

The gift box can be ordered  in advance (at least 12 hours in advance and no later than 12 February 12 2024) by email at meetings.events@esplanade.hr or by phone at 01 45 66 023. The gift box costs 34 €. Limited availability.

  • Valentine’s menu
  • Lovers’ Cocktails

Published on 26 January 2024

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row]
